comment: поначалу монстра там нет, но мы видим следы его деятельности - трупы разорванные и следы когтей на полу

languages.text: Судя по кровавому следу, здесь недавно проволокли чье-то тело.

traits.locale_text: [DRAFT] Барк про следы монстра в нижнем уровне

languages.text: As indicated by the bloody trail, a body was recently dragged through here.
languages.original_text: Судя по кровавому следу, здесь недавно проволокли чье-то тело.

traits.locale_text: Judging by the bloody trail, a body was recently dragged through here.
Judging by the bloody trail, a body was recently dragged through here.
As indicated by the bloody trail, a body was recently dragged through here.
As indicated by the bloody trail, a body was recently dragged through here.
As indicated by the bloody trail, a body was recently dragged through here.
As indicated by the bloody trail, a body was recently dragged through here.

languages.text: 最近誰かが死体を引きずったことを示す血痕がある。
languages.original_text: As indicated by the bloody trail, a body was recently dragged through here.

traits.locale_text: 最近誰かが死体を引きずったことを示す血痕がある。

languages.text: 从血迹判断，不久之前刚刚有一具尸体被拖过这里。
languages.original_text: As indicated by the bloody trail, a body was recently dragged through here.

traits.locale_text: 从血迹判断，不久之前刚刚有一具尸体被拖过这里。

languages.text: A juzgar por el rastro de sangre, se ha arrastrado un cuerpo por aquí hace poco.
languages.original_text: As indicated by the bloody trail, a body was recently dragged through here.

traits.locale_text: A juzgar por el rastro de sangre, se ha arrastrado un cuerpo por aquí hace poco.

languages.text: Die Blutspur lässt vermuten, dass hier kürzlich eine Leiche durchgeschleift wurde.
languages.original_text: As indicated by the bloody trail, a body was recently dragged through here.

traits.locale_text: Die Blutspur lässt vermuten, dass hier kürzlich eine Leiche durchgeschleift wurde.

languages.text: À en juger par la trace sanglante, un corps a récemment été traîné par ici.
languages.original_text: As indicated by the bloody trail, a body was recently dragged through here.

traits.locale_text: À en juger par la trace sanglante, un corps a récemment été traîné par ici.

languages.text: Kanlı izlerden de anlaşılacağı üzere kısa süre önce burada bir beden sürüklenmiş.
languages.original_text: As indicated by the bloody trail, a body was recently dragged through here.

traits.locale_text: Kanlı izlerden de anlaşılacağı üzere, burada yakın zamanda bir beden sürüklenmiş.
